# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README bug75.cir bug75.cir.sh count.pl tags options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug75.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/count.pl PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_75_SON/bug75.cir.sh COMMAND bash bug75.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug75.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_75_SON/bug75.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_75_SON/bug75.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "analytic;serial;parallel;valgrind;nightly;mutualinductor;errorexit")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_75_SON/bug75.cir.sh COMMAND bash bug75.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug75.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_75_SON/bug75.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_75_SON/bug75.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "analytic;serial;parallel;valgrind;nightly;mutualinductor;errorexit")
endif()
